function.name: SSFI_RETURNPAYMENTCOUNT
function.body:
v_CountPayments NUMBER(32) ; --OBTG:NUMBER--
BEGIN
SELECT COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM C_INVOICE CI JOIN FIN_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE FPS ON FPS.C_INVOICE_ID = CI.C_INVOICE_ID JOIN FIN_PAYMENT_SCHEDULEDETAIL FPSD ON FPSD.FIN_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_INVOICE = FPS.FIN_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID JOIN FIN_PAYMENT_DETAIL FPD ON FPD.FIN_PAYMENT_DETAIL_ID = FPSD.FIN_PAYMENT_DETAIL_ID JOIN FIN_PAYMENT FP ON FP.FIN_PAYMENT_ID = FPD.FIN_PAYMENT_ID WHERE CI.C_INVOICE_ID = p_invoice_id),0) INTO v_CountPayments FROM DUAL;
RETURN v_CountPayments; END SSFI_RETURNPAYMENTCOUNT
